rooms.description: Modern living area with floor-to-ceiling windows and minimalistic decor.
Fully equipped kitchen with ample storage and an island counter.
Spacious bedroom with built-in wardrobe and a balcony adjoining the room.
Well-ventilated bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony.
Modern bathroom with sufficient ventilation and storage.

openings.details: Double door entrance ensuring secure access while maintaining aesthetic appeal
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and kitchen providing ample natural light.
Spacious balconies adjoining each bedroom designed for outdoor relaxation with privacy screens.

levels.notes: This 1BHK apartment plan is designed keeping in mind the modern aesthetics and Vastu principles. The plot dimensions of 50x80 feet allow for optimal space utilization while incorporating ample open spaces and natural light. The rooftop terrace, although not included within the ground floor level JSON schema, can be integrated on an additional level or as a designated outdoor area for family activities.
